name: Cloud Workstation and Labs System
description: Cloud Workstation and Labs System for an e-learning organization, ensuring students could easily perform remote labs. We expertly designed the architecture, collaborated on UI/UX, and implemented the backend integration with AWS, enabling users to launch machines based on token usage for diverse computing needs.

name: Cyber Security and Hacking Labs
description: We developed a platform where users can learn hacking by attacking vulnerable systems in a private network by connecting with using site-to-site VPNs.

name: E-Learning Application (LMS)
description: We designed and implemented a Learning Management System (LMS) for an E-Learning Organization, incorporating robust security measures to monitor both application and infrastructure security.

name: Car Market Japan
